short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find and extract emails from the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically find and save emails on any web page!

- Capture as you browse
- Automate visiting a list of sites
- Removes duplicates
- Export to CSV, XLS, or TXT

Find all email addresses in seconds.
